SVGMaskElementX.summary: The read-only x property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("x")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("mask")}}. It represents the x-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementX.value: An object in the coordinate system defined by . The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the initial x value.
